name: run-cancel
title: Cancel Run
description: Cancel a running assistant execution that is currently in progress. Use this to stop long-running operations, abort stuck runs, or cancel runs that are no longer needed. The run will be stopped and marked as cancelled.

thread_id.description: The unique identifier of the thread containing the run (format: "thread_abc123...").

run_id.description: The unique identifier of the run to cancel (format: "run_abc123..."). Only runs in 'in_progress' or 'requires_action' status can be cancelled.

examples.title: Cancel stuck run
examples.description: Stop a run that is taking too long or appears to be stuck
